basics.name: Mikel Larrea
basics.label: Researcher
basics.summary: UPV/EHU Lecturer in Control Systems and Automation Engineering. My research interests include Intelligent Control, Neural Networks, and Multi-Objective Optimization.

work.name: Faculty of Engineering, University of the Basque Country (UPV/EHU)
work.position: Lecturer in Control Systems and Automation Engineering
work.summary: Teaching in Control Systems and Automation Engineering, Robotics and more.

publications.name: Estudio de las Redes PINN como modelos de sistemas dinámicos
publications.publisher: Simposios del Comité Español de Automática (CEA)
publications.summary: Studies Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) as alternative models to represent and analyze dynamic systems.

publications.name: Modelos de ensamblaje con redes neuronales para la identificación de sistemas
publications.summary: Proposes the use of neural networks to assemble partial models for system identification, improving accuracy and generalization.

publications.name: Review of Aerial Transportation of Suspended-Cable Payloads with Quadrotors
publications.summary: Comprehensive review on aerial transportation of suspended loads using quadrotor drones, including dynamics, control strategies, and recent research trends.

publications.name: A Narrative Review of Haptic Technologies and Their Value for Training, Rehabilitation, and the Education of Persons with Special Needs
publications.summary: Narrative review of haptic technologies applied to special education, rehabilitation, and training, highlighting human–computer interaction approaches.

publications.name: Control of MIMO Systems with iMO-NMPC Strategy
publications.summary: Extends the intelligent Multi-Objective Nonlinear Model Predictive Control (iMO-NMPC) strategy to MIMO systems, validating performance and robustness through simulations.

publications.name: Desarrollo de la estrategia iMO-NMPC: primeros pasos para su implementación en dispositivos industriales
publications.summary: Describes the methodology for implementing intelligent control strategies, such as iMO-NMPC, on industrial platforms using automatic code generation.

publications.name: Extreme learning machine ensemble model for time series forecasting boosted by PSO: Application to an electric consumption problem
publications.summary: Proposes an ensemble model based on Extreme Learning Machines optimized with PSO for time series forecasting, applied to electric consumption prediction.

publications.name: A Low-Cost, Portable Solution for Stress and Relaxation Estimation Based on a Real-Time Fuzzy Algorithm
publications.summary: Develops a low-cost, portable solution for real-time stress and relaxation estimation using a fuzzy algorithm.

publications.name: A PSO Boosted Ensemble of Extreme Learning Machines for Time Series Forecasting
publications.summary: Presents an initial approach using the PSO algorithm to optimize ensemble models based on Extreme Learning Machines for time series forecasting.

publications.name: About Extracting Dynamic Information of Unknown Complex Systems by Neural Networks
publications.summary: Proposes a methodology to extract dynamic information from unknown complex systems using neural networks and equilibrium point analysis.

publications.name: Real time direct kinematic problem computation of the 3PRS robot using neural networks
publications.summary: Uses neural networks to solve the direct kinematic problem of a 3PRS parallel robot in real time, optimizing accuracy and computational performance.

publications.name: Implementation and testing of a soft computing based model predictive control on an industrial controller
publications.summary: Presents a real-time implementation of a model predictive controller based on soft computing techniques on an industrial controller.

publications.name: Primeros resultados de un control genetico predictivo sobre maqueta de helicoptero (twinrotor)
publications.summary: Presents initial results of a genetic predictive controller applied to a twin-rotor helicopter model.

publications.name: Soft computing testing in real industrial platforms for process intelligent control
publications.publisher: Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing
publications.summary: Evaluates the behavior of soft computing techniques in industrial platforms for intelligent process control.

publications.name: Prototipado rápido para el desarrollo y evaluación de controladores inteligentes sobre plataformas industriales en tiempo real
publications.publisher: VIII Simposio CEA de Control Inteligente
publications.summary: Describes a rapid prototyping system for testing intelligent controllers on industrial platforms running in real time.

publications.name: Intelligent Multi-Objective Nonlinear Model Predictive Control (iMO-NMPC): Towards the ‘on-line’ optimization of highly complex control problems
publications.summary: Proposes a multi-objective nonlinear model predictive control scheme combining neural networks, genetic algorithms, and fuzzy systems.

publications.name: Nonlinear system control based on Neural Networks with Adaptive Predictive strategy
publications.publisher: Emerging Technologies and Factory Automation (ETFA), 2010 IEEE Conference on
publications.summary: Presents an adaptive predictive control strategy based on neural networks applied to nonlinear systems.

publications.name: A Hybridized neuro-genetic solution for controlling industrial R^3 workspace
publications.summary: Proposes a hybrid neuro-genetic controller for managing three-dimensional industrial workspaces.

publications.name: A Neuro-genetic Control Scheme Application for Industrial R^3 Workspaces
publications.summary: Describes the application of a neuro-genetic control scheme to three-dimensional industrial workspaces.

publications.name: Adding Nonlinear System Dynamics to Levenberg-Marquardt Algorithm for Neural Network Control
publications.summary: Proposes an extension of the Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm to include nonlinear system dynamics during neural controller training.

publications.name: Esquema de Control Adaptativo-Predictivo basado en Redes Neuronales
publications.summary: Presents an adaptive predictive control scheme based on neural networks for nonlinear dynamic systems.

publications.name: Control Adaptativo-Predictivo de sistemas no-lineales mediante Redes Neuronales
publications.summary: Develops an adaptive predictive controller using neural networks for the control of nonlinear systems.

publications.name: Una revisión del Estado del Arte en el diseño de RNAŽs mediante AGŽs
publications.publisher: VI Congreso Español sobre Metaheurísticas, Algoritmos Evolutivos y Bioinspirados
publications.summary: State-of-the-art review on the use of genetic algorithms for designing artificial neural networks.

publications.name: Aplicación de Técnicas Neuro-Genéticas en la resolución del problema de control cinemático en un puente grúa
publications.summary: Proposes a kinematic control solution for an overhead crane using neuro-genetic techniques for multi-objective optimization.

publications.name: Una Metodología De Bajo Coste Computacional Para El Control Predictivo De Sistemas No Lineales Mediante Redes Neuronales
publications.summary: Proposes an efficient low-computational-cost methodology for nonlinear predictive control using neural networks.

projects.name: MODELIZACIÓN DE PROCESOS INDUSTRIALES CON DINÁMICAS COMPLEJAS PARA SU APLICACIÓN EN NOVEDOSAS ESTRATEGIAS DE CONTROL PREDICTIVO
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
